statements: UPDATE WebsiteTrafficData SET visitor_location = 'London' WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
UPDATE WebsiteTrafficData SET page_visited = 'Home Page', visitor_device = 'Mobile' WHERE visitor_id = 54321;
UPDATE WebsiteTrafficData SET visitor_location='New York' WHERE visitor_id=12345;
UPDATE WebsiteTrafficData SET visitor_device='Desktop', visit_timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE visitor_id=54321;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visitor_id = 1001, page_visited = 'Home Page' WHERE website_id = 101
UPDATE dashboard_data SET last_updated = '2022-08-15 10:30:00', widget_type = 'Chart' WHERE dashboard_id = 201
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visitor_id = 1001, visit_time = '2023-01-05 15:30:00' WHERE website_id = 500;
UPDATE dashboard_data SET data_source = 'API', last_updated = '2023-01-08 10:45:00' WHERE dashboard_id = 200;
UPDATE website_visitors SET visitor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE dashboard_data SET data_source_code = 'SELECT * FROM website_visitors;' WHERE dashboard_id = 1;
UPDATE website_visitors SET visitor_name = 'John Doe', visit_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE visitor_id = 101;
UPDATE dashboard_data SET dashboard_type = 'line_chart', data_source_code = 'SELECT * FROM website_visitors' WHERE dashboard_id = 201;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_details SET visit_count = 5 WHERE visitor_id = 3;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited='About Us' WHERE visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
UPDATE visitor_details SET visitor_location='New York', visit_count=visit_count + 1 WHERE visitor_name='Alice'
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Home Page' WHERE visit_id = 12345;
UPDATE visitor_details SET visitor_country = 'Canada' WHERE visitor_id = 54321;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited='Home Page' WHERE visit_id=1001 AND visitor_ip='192.168.1.1'
UPDATE visitor_details SET visitor_country='USA', visitor_email='newemail@example.com' WHERE visitor_id=2002
